title: Lieutenant ¡Diablo!
description: Christie Dancer quits her job at the strip club to join the police force and solve her father’s murder. She teams up with Diablo, owner of the nightclub Hades and man of biblical intuition.
quote: It was a devil of a case, but this scum didn’t stand a chance in hell. Book him!
creator: Matt Owens
altHero: Diablo, a handsome bearded man, looks at the camera with a knowing, raised eyebrow as Detective Dancer, a beautiful blonde woman, looks at him with admiration
alt1: Diablo brings a suspect into custody
alt2: Diablo talks with another detective, Doofus
alt3: Diablo and Dancer gaze into each other’s eyes
alt4: a blonde woman with dark-rimmed glasses smiles
